attributes.action: Call a general election now or with in a few weeks
attributes.additional_details: Parliament have been bickering and arguing about this debate of brexit for 3 years and we seem to be going around in circles. Extension after extension and nothing gained. This petition is to call a general election NOW to let the people of the UK decide who is going to sort this mess out . Parliament have rejected the deal 3 times, and rejected No Deal. Something needs to be done and sorted out as they can’t seem to sort it. How many more extensions can we have and parliament kick the can down the road ?
attributes.background: A petition for a snap general election
